alert.note: Alert for Addison; Chittenden; Franklin; Grand Isle; Lamoille; Washington; Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued February 19 at 12:33PM EST until February 19 at 1:30PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Clinton County in northern New York... Essex County in northern New York... Western Lamoille County in northwestern Vermont... Addison County in central Vermont... Grand Isle County in northwestern Vermont... Chittenden County in northwestern Vermont... Northwestern Windsor County in southern Vermont... Western Washington County in central Vermont... Franklin County in northwestern Vermont... * Until 130 PM EST. * At 1230 PM EST, a line of dangerous snow squalls was located along a line extending from near West Beekmantown to North Hudson in New York, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Whiteout conditions. Zero visibility in heavy snow and blowing snow. Wind gusts in excess of 35 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. * This includes Interstate 89 between mile markers 66 and 129. Locations impacted include... Essex Junction, Plattsburgh International Airport, Burlington, Burlington International Airport, Plattsburgh, Middlebury, South Burlington, Vergennes, Peru, Beekmantown, Schuyler Falls, Moriah, Chazy, Saranac, Mooers, Altona, Willsboro, Crown Point, Enosburg Falls and Westport. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow Down! Rapid changes in visibility and road conditions are expected with this dangerous snow squall. Be alert for sudden whiteout conditions.

area.areaDesc: Addison; Chittenden; Franklin; Grand Isle; Lamoille; Washington; Windsor
